title: My Childhood Friend, Who Is Like an Older Sister to Me, Clearly Has a Crush on Me - Novel Updates
tags: Bands   Beautiful Female Lead   Childhood Friends   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Older Love Interests
author: Kaki Shinba   柿心刃
description:
Kana Nishida, my childhood friend who is like an older sister to me, is a girl with three things in common: good looks, good manners, and excellent grades. She goes to a famous girls' school around here. Kana, who seems to have no connection with me, suddenly approached me one day.

My name is Kaede Suo.

I'm an ordinary boy who goes to a boys' school on the opposite side of the city from the girls' school.>
